infos.info: (1) Chet Kingsbury provided the music - (2) Sound effects were by Frank Blatter, Michael Eisenmenger, Chet Hill, Tom Horan, John Katulik, and Bob Graham. - (3)Program Opening: - Announcer: We present again today 'Backstage Wife,'ÃÂ the story of Mary Noble, an Iowa girl who marries Larry Noble, a handsome matinÃÂÃÂ©e idol, dream sweetheart of a million other women, and her struggles to keep his love in the complicated atmosphere of backstage life.
